mapper.select: SELECT pdi_target_host FROM public_deploy_info WHERE pdi_deploy_seq = #{seq} LIMIT 1

SELECT tami_app_ip as tamiAppIp, tami_cpu_count as tamiCpuCount, tami_cpu_load as tamiCpuLoad, tami_sys_memory as tamiSysMemory, tami_sys_avail_memory as tamiSysAvailMemory, tami_app_use_memory as tamiAppUseMemory, tami_app_heap_max_memory as tamiAppHeapMaxMemory, tami_app_heap_min_memory as tamiAppHeapMinMemory, tami_app_heap_use_memory as tamiAppHeapUseMemory, tami_app_nonheap_max_memory as tamiAppNoheapMaxMemory, tami_app_nonheap_min_memory as tamiAppNoheapMinMemory, tami_app_nonheap_use_memory as tamiAppNoheapUseMemory, gmt_modify as gmtModify FROM trace_app_mermory_info WHERE tami_app_ip = #{appIp} and gmt_create BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') order by tami_id;

SELECT tati_app_ip as tatiAppIp, tati_thread_id as tatiThreadId, tati_thread_name as tatiThreadName, tati_thread_status as tatiThreadStatus, tati_thread_start_mtime as tatiThreadStartMtime, tati_thread_blocked_count as tatiThreadBlockedCount, tati_thread_blocked_mtime as tatiThreadBlockedMtime, tati_thread_blocked_name as tatiThreadBlockedName, tati_thread_blocked_id as tatiThreadBlockedId, tati_thread_waited_count as tatiThreadWaitedCount, tati_thread_waited_mtime as tatiThreadWaitedMtime, tati_thread_max_count as tatiThreadMaxCount, tati_thread_stack as tatiThreadStack, gmt_modify as gmtModify FROM trace_app_thread_info WHERE tati_app_ip = #{appIp} AND gmt_modify BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
and tati_thread_name = #{threadName} LIMIT 1

SELECT trh_app_ip as trhAppIp, trh_redis_ip as trhRedisIp, trh_redis_flag as trhRedisFlag, trh_slave_ip as trhSlaveIp, trh_cluster_type as trhClusterType, trh_rdb_open as trhRdbOpen, trh_rdb_file as trhRdbFile, trh_rdb_save_type as trhRdbSaveType, trh_aof_open as trhAofOpen, trh_aof_file as trhAofFile, trh_aof_save_type as trhAofSaveType, trh_aof_rdb_open as trhAofRdbOpen, trh_memory_count as trhMemoryCount, trh_memory_available_count as trhMemoryAvailableCount, trh_memory_peak as trhMemoryPeak, trh_memory_fragmentation_ratio as trhMemoryFragmentationCount, trh_keyspace_ratio as trhKeyspaceRatio, trh_keys_count as trhKeysCount, trh_last_rdb_status as trhLastRdbStatus, trh_last_aof_status as trhLastAofStatus, trh_last_fork_usec as trhLastForkUsec, trh_conn_total_count as trhConnTotalCount, trh_conn_cur_count as trhConnCurCount, trh_conn_block_count as trhConnBlockCount, trh_log_path as trhLogPath, trh_config_path as trhConfigPath, trh_sentinel_monitor as trhSentinelMonitor, trh_sentinel_config_path as trhSentinelConfigPath, gmt_modify as gmtModify FROM trace_redis_health WHERE trh_app_ip in
#{appIp}

SELECT tsi_service_bean_name as tsiServiceBeanName, tsi_service_name as tsiServiceName, tsi_service_path as tsiServicePath, tsi_provider as tsiProvider, tsi_consumer as tsiConsumer, tsi_provider_names as tsiProviderNames, tsi_consumer_names as tsiConsumerNames, gmt_modify as gmtModify FROM trace_services_info
tsi_provider_names like CONCAT('%', #{ip}, '%')
or
tsi_consumer_names like CONCAT('%', #{ip}, '%')
and tsi_service_bean_name = #{serviceBeanName} limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trace_services_info(tsi_service_bean_name, tsi_provider, tsi_consumer) VALUES (#{srvCode}, #{providerName}, #{consumerName}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE tsi_consumer = values(tsi_consumer);
mapper.select: SELECT IF((SELECT 1 FROM trace_services_info WHERE tsi_service_bean_name = #{srvCode} limit 1) = 1, 1, 0);
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO service_limit_info(sli_service_bean_name, sli_service_name, sli_qps_limit, sli_fallback) VALUES (#{srvCode}, #{srvName}, #{qps}, #{fallback}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE sli_qps_limit = values(sli_qps_limit), sli_fallback = values(sli_fallback);
